summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3881 for the improvement of 41st Avenue Southwest, from West Alaska Street to West Morgan Street, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 47404, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
